sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
nice
, to pomeni, da se nam zdi prijetno, ugodno ali privlačno.

seg.quote: It would be nice to see you.
Did you have a nice time at the party?
I always think Bessie dresses very nicely.

sense.def:
Kadar človek naredi ali reče nekaj, kar je
nice
, je prijazen in uvideven.

seg.quote: It's nice of you to say that.
How nice of you to come.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
nice
, je prijazen in prijeten.

seg.quote: He was a terribly nice man.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
nice to someone
, se do njega vede prijateljsko, razumevajoče ali vljudno.

seg.quote: I wish I'd been nicer to him.
You may go if you ask nicely.
